name: cinematically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to, or is typical of the cinema: Cinematically speaking, this is the film's most effective moment. When I describe a scene in the book, I'm often thinking about it cinematically.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is cinematically stunning, with its gorgeous settings of a picture-book castle surrounded by grassy fields and cloudless skies. This is the most emotionally rich and cinematically thrilling film I've seen all year.She uses the space to open out the action almost cinematically.
